oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dr. Emilio del Carril presented an honorary citizenship by Mayor Ben West and the City of Nashville, 1960 April 18
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured left to right: Nashville Mayor Ben West, Dr. Emilio Donato del Carril and an unidentified man. This photo was taken when Dr. Emilio Donato del Carril, Argentine Ambassador to the United States was touring the southeastern area with his wife and an official party. During his visit to Nashville he was received by Mayor West and presented an honorary citizenship of the City of Nashville award. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carril, Emilio Donato del, 1906-1985; West, Ben, 1911-1974
